title: Speak with Animals
content:
racial trait exclusive to the Forest Gnome. A rare and secretive race, they are natural at stealth and moving quickly. Forest Gnomes tend to be friendly with other good-spirited Woodland creatures, and at level 1 they have the ability to Speak with Animals.
